lead_paragraph: Evan Sharpley, a junior, will start at quarterback for Notre Dame against Southern California, the third starter for the Fighting Irish this season. Coach Charlie Weis said he decided to let Sharpley make his first start because he had been steadily improving. Also, the freshman Jimmy Clausen, who had been starting, was banged up after having been sacked 23 times.
